apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this representation of a loving couple features two women with distinct medium and dark skin tones, their forms rendered with Apple’s signature soft rounded edges and subtle 3D shading. A vibrant red heart, imbued with Apple’s characteristic glossy sheen, floats between them, symbolizing deep affection and partnership. The realistic lighting and smooth gradients on Apple devices convey a genuine sense of unity and romance, making it a powerful emoji for expressing LGBTQ+ love and solidarity.
